review: Great little game, absolutely love burning stuff, and getting the reactions. And trying to get combos. Cute ending too. Would recommend :)

helpful: 25 of 29 people (86%) found this review helpful
review: Contrast has to be one of my all time favourite games. The puzzles are very unique, making you think outside the box.Working with shadows and lights, makes for a very different atmosphere and way of thinking. I am just absolutely in love with this game.The only downside is the story line isn't as full as it could have been. But I know the developers were low on funds and time and had to cut a MASSIVE part of their plans out. Looking forward to their upcoming game :)

review: This is by far one of my favourite games. Exploring the world of a childs imagination accompanied by his best friend the teddy in search of his mother. The ending shows you the harsh reality that no kid should have to go through.
